title: feat: add 6 BYOP app submissions to showcase
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Six new flowers in the garden
gist.blurb: The community garden is blooming! We've added six new creative apps to our showcase, from puzzle generators to AI playgrounds.
gist.summary: Added six new community-built applications to the official showcase, including educational tools and AI playgrounds.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and explore six new creative tools built on the Pollinations platform.
gist.visual_concept: A garden scene representing the community showcase. The 6 new apps are depicted as 6 distinct, colorful pixel art flowers or magical plants sprouting from the ground. The Pollinations bee mascot is watering them with a pixelated watering can. The vibe is growth and celebration.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot watering six unique, colorful magical flowers sprouting in a digital garden. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee has a yellow body, dark stripes, pink blush, and wears a tiny gardener's hat. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'NEW APPS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
